responses.question2: Video is essential initially for understanding what is going on, but after some time (if one were to pay attention to the data) it would become less important.
responses.question3: It is helpful if you don't want to wait for the video to load, but it takes some time to learn the patterns (more time than I had, I think)
responses.question4: I think the software is great. The keyboard shortcuts were versatile and covering enough, yet simple enough that I understood them very quickly.
